name: Bima Sakti
about: I am a UI designer with a passion for creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. I have a strong understanding of design principles and work closely with developers to bring my design to life. I have had the opportunity to work with a variety of clients at a studio and I am always striving to improve my skills and stay up to date on the latest design trends
intro: Bringing your ideas to life through UI design
